info.headline: Heat Advisory issued October 15 at 3:50AM AST until October 15 at 4:00PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heat indices of 108 to 111 degrees Fahrenheit. * WHERE...The urban and coastal areas of eastern Puerto Rico, St. Croix and St. Thomas. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 4 PM AST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Heat exhaustion is likely with prolonged exposure. Heat stroke possible. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.&&
